item.title: Premium Amish Country Tour including Amish Farm and House
item.description: Immerse yourself in the customs and traditions of Amish country during this 3-part tour. Explore a farmhouse dating from 1805 where you will listen to narrative on the customs, culture, and traditions of the Amish. In a minibus, enjoy a scenic ride through the Amish countryside, complete with photo ops. Then take a self-guided tour through an historic farmstead that includes a schoolhouse, a craft market, and a variety of farm animals.

image.alt: Premium Amish Country Tour including Amish Farm and House

item.title: Amish Experience SuperSaver Package
item.description: No trip to Lancaster County is complete without learning about the Amish communities that call this part of Pennsylvania home. This tour provides incredible value by combining three top Amish experiences into a single booking: tour Amish farmlands in a 14-passenger shuttle, watch a theater performance that tells the story of an Amish family, and take a guided walking tour of a replica Amish house and school.

image.alt: Amish Experience SuperSaver Package

item.title: Unique Amish Immersion in Lancaster
item.description: Learn all about Amish culture, traditions, and history—and immerse yourself in an Amish community in Lancaster, Pennsylvania—on this in-depth, small-group tour. Pick between morning and afternoon tour times and meet your guide in Lancaster. You’ll visit a working farm and will meet a local Amish family, will drive through miles of scenic countryside, will visit an Amish-owned creamery for ice cream, and much more.

image.alt: Unique Amish Immersion in Lancaster

item.title: Authentic Tour & Meal with the Amish!
item.description: Learn about Amish culture in Pennsylvania's Lancaster County on this tour and dining experience. You'll explore the countryside to see historical landmarks and then meet a local Amish family for a sit-down home-cooked meal, where you'll have the chance to observe their way of life on a farm. The tour is designed by a local resident who grew up as a Mennonite outside Strasburg, PA, and whose father was born Amish. Times and dates may be subject to change due to scheduling with the families.

image.alt: Authentic Tour & Meal with the Amish!

item.title: 45-Minute Private Guided Historic Walking Tour in Lititz
item.description: From a Revolutionary War hospital to the history of the Moravians, there’s plenty to see and learn on this short but sweet private tour. A personable and enthusiastic guide will show you around town and share stories about the area’s fascinating history spanning centuries. Ask as many questions as you like on this private, educational experience.

image.alt: 45-Minute Private Guided Historic Walking Tour in Lititz

item.title: Truly Authentic Lancaster Experience!
item.description: Discover the highlights of Lancaster, learn about the area’s Amish and Mennonite communities, and enjoy local experiences that most tourists miss on this small-group tour. Led by your guide (who has local roots), you’ll visit highlights like the Lancaster Central Market and Fulton Theatre, will explore historic churches and museums, will connect with community members, and will even enjoy several sweet treats as you go.

image.alt: Truly Authentic Lancaster Experience!

item.title: Guided Ghost Tour of Lititz
item.description: Explore Lititz, a town founded in 1756, and hear all about its storied past from a guide with a passion for the macabre. Stop by an old Revolutionary War hospital, a tavern said to be haunted, and more as you hear all about the scary stories and dark history of these buildings. And don’t worry—the subject matter may be spooky, but the tour is family-friendly.

image.alt: Guided Ghost Tour of Lititz

item.title: International Food Tour Lancaster, Pennsylvania
item.description: Discover the most interesting places to eat in Lancaster on this small-group food tour. Try a diverse mix of international flavors—such as Danish, Cuban, French, Italian, and Ukrainian cuisine. Along the way, hear commentary about locals that you wouldn’t discover if exploring alone—such as the stories of immigrants and refugees who moved to Lancaster to search for better lives and ended up launching local food businesses.

image.alt: International Food Tour Lancaster, Pennsylvania

item.title: Red Rose Walking Food Tour in Lancaster
item.description: Enjoy a delectable introduction to Lancaster, Pennsylvania—and learn about its unique culture and history—on this private walking tour. Meet your guide at the Lancaster City Visitor Center, and set off to discover local historical highlights on foot. Be sure to come hungry: you'll also visit a number of independent restaurants and food businesses, and will enjoy enough generous samples to add up to a hearty lunch.

image.alt: Red Rose Walking Food Tour in Lancaster

item.title: Guided Tour of the 1792 Johannes Mueller House
item.description: Lititz is a Pennsylvania city that showcases a picture-perfect peak into small town America. Located near Lancaster, this guided tour of the 1792 Johannes Mueller House lets you see what explores the history of the Moravians living here in the 18th century. Built way back in 1740, this home was rebuilt in the 1790s and restored over the years to capture what everyday life was like for Moravians who immigrated from Germany to Pennsylvania.

image.alt: Guided Tour of the 1792 Johannes Mueller House

item.title: Lancaster History and Craft Beer Walk
item.description: Combine history and craft beer during this guided tour of Lancaster, ideal for first-time visitors. Learn more about Lancaster landmarks—such as the farmers market and theater—than you could if exploring independently, before sampling some of the city’s best craft beers alongside your guide.

image.alt: Lancaster History and Craft Beer Walk

item.title: Sweet & Savory Tour of Lancaster City!
item.description: Learn all about Lancaster’s unique culinary scene—as well as its history and culture—on this small-group walking tour. Led by a former professional baker, this experience offers an inside-track introduction to the city’s independent food businesses, as well as plenty of opportunities to sample. Taste sweet and savory treats (from cupcakes and baked goods to pickles and more), meet local shop owners, and discover Lancaster lore as you explore.

image.alt: Sweet & Savory Tour of Lancaster City!

item.title: Lititz Whiskey and History Tour
item.description:
Through personal stories and beautiful architecture, Lititz, Pennsylvania’s heritage and unique past will come alive as you travel from one end of historic Main Street to the other, learning about over 25 historic structures along the way, many of which date back to the 1700s.
Just some of the many places you will see include: -America’s first commercial pretzel bakery -Lancaster County’s first pharmacy -The location of Lititz’s first bank -A Revolutionary War Hospital
Visitors will then visit Stoll & Wolfe Distillery, where they will enjoy a guided tasting of three local whiskeys. Guests will also learn about the whiskey and distilling history of the Lititz area. This tour is for ages 21 and over.

image.alt: Lititz Whiskey and History Tour

item.title: Lancaster City Scavenger Hunt
item.description: This activity was created by Kendra Wolfe Lancaster's Woman of Achievement! She will assist you throughout the event. You need 1 ticket per person. Work as a team to complete 20+ activities in downtown Lancaster. Including Historic Markets, Arcades, Flower Shops, Candy Stores, and more! Find out what Lancaster is famous for! The longer you play the more treats and freebies you earn. This is an app-based scavenger hunt. You must be comfortable using a cell phone. Each location hosts a fun and engaging activity perfect for all ages. Come prepared to solve puzzles, decode riddles, and earn local prizes along the way! Team building activity for corporate groups. A fun way to experience Lancaster for couples or groups. The activity changes frequently based on the season of the year. You will receive an instructional video on how to get set up. Follow the prompts in our scavenger hunt app to find each activity on a race against the clock. Help is only a text or call away if needed.

image.alt: Lancaster City Scavenger Hunt

item.title: Historic Lancaster Photo Shoot Tour
item.description: The 18th-century architecture is a stunning site for visitors and locals alike. Lancaster County is also known as "The Garden Spot." There is an abundance of foliage and flowers everywhere you look. Statues and cathedrals line the streets resembling the early modern church era! It is rich with local coffee shops, cafes, and parks to explore! There is something for everyone.

image.alt: Historic Lancaster Photo Shoot Tour

item.title: Lancaster History and Breakfast Walking Tour
item.description:
Wouldn't a historic walking tour be better with breakfast? We think so! This is the only year-round walking tour in downtown Lancaster. All the while savoring delicious breakfast foods. We will take you to hidden spots in the city and many historic locations.
This upbeat, engaging, two-hour tour will begin with coffee or tea. Your guide from Unique Lancaster Experiences will take you on a walking tour of the Oldest Inland City in America. You will learn about the history of Lancaster dating back to 1730.
Breakfast foods may include bagels, Amish-made breakfast sandwiches, fruity pastries, and stoppies. Learn all about this history in Lancaster City on our Breakfast & History Tour. Groups of 8+ may request a private tour
We can accommodate vegetarians. Unique Lancaster Experiences offers team-building activities in Lancaster and private group walking tours. Gift cards are available. This activity meets at the Historic Welcome Center at 38 Penn Square.

image.alt: Lancaster History and Breakfast Walking Tour

item.title: Guided Brewery Walking Tour in Lancaster City
item.description:
This craft beer experience features a walking tour of historic Lancaster City and 3 of its 7 independent craft breweries located within a very walkable radius. Guests will enjoy guided craft beer tastings led by our knowledgeable and experienced Beer Guides while exploring behind-the-scenes access to learn about brewing, and more.
Whether you're a craft beer aficionado, a novice, or someone who just wants to learn more about craft beer, this tour is for you!

image.alt: Guided Brewery Walking Tour in Lancaster City

item.title: Modern Birdhouse Class in Lancaster
item.description:
We are the only woodshop in Lancaster City and County to offer woodcraft classes, providing a rare opportunity to craft in a real woodshop. Immerse yourself in an authentic and inspiring woodworking environment as you learn, create, and experience the satisfaction of crafting your own beautiful birdhouse.
In our unique woodcraft class, you'll gain hands-on experience with a variety of essential woodworking tools and techniques. Begin by learning precise cutting with the band saw and drilling perfect holes using the drill press. Next, you'll use the router table to create smooth edges and gain confidence with quick assembly using nail guns. Achieving a smooth finish will be a breeze with the orbital sanders, and you'll practice making clean joints with mitre folds. Finally, you'll have the opportunity to customize your birdhouse with paint and stains, adding a personal touch to your project.

image.alt: Modern Birdhouse Class in Lancaster

item.title: Lancaster Puzzling Adventure
item.description: With this self-guided Lancaster scavenger hunt tour, exploring the city’s gems becomes a game. Solve puzzles and decode brain teasers that lead you to top sights around the city. Because the entire activity is on your smartphone, you can start and stop on your own schedule along with up a group of up to 12 of your friends, family members, or co-workers.

image.alt: Lancaster Puzzling Adventure

item.title: Meal in an Amish Home Experience
item.description: Guided Amish Farmlands Tour Amish quilt and craft shop visit All-you-care-to-eat, family-style meal in an Amish home Q&A with Amish host

image.alt: Meal in an Amish Home Experience

item.title: Lively Lancaster Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Our very unique, immersive adventures are the only ones of their kind. We, unlike other companies, provide your very own remote, interactive, live host to assist and encourage you along through your phone. We are an Austin, TX-based global custom event design company offering scavenger hunts and other events in 300+ cities in North America and beyond. Our specially hand-crafted adventures are equal parts tour, creative challenge, detective hunt, and social experiment!
Guests get to discover in an alternate reality our favorite hidden gems off the beaten trail and creatively interpret fun art, history, and culture clues - for points! They get to enjoy fame and glory while appearing on our website’s international leaderboard, no matter what their score. They get to essentially race other teams in other cities, even if they don’t have competitors who have signed up in their city that day. Get ready to discover unusual oddities, laugh out loud, and make the experience your own!

image.alt: Lively Lancaster Scavenger Hunt

item.title: Murder Mystery Night Solve the Case Lancaster PA
item.description:
Immerse yourself in an evening of delicious food and a thrilling mystery. This detective-style mystery takes place in a unique 19th-century stone venue. Unlike any other, this 2.5-hour adventure begins with a delectable meal prepared by a local chef, setting the stage for an evening of culinary and intellectual delight.
As participants, you will strive to unravel the mystery. Mislead your fellow detectives to solve the case first! With online progress tracking, hidden clues, and continuous food and drink, it's an engaging blend of strategy and suspense. Looking for things to do in downtown Lancaster? Spend your evening with friends or family and have an unforgettable experience.

image.alt: Murder Mystery Night Solve the Case Lancaster PA
